sentences.sContent: Environmentalists are prejudiced against the dam.
sentences.sCn: 环境保护论者对那座水坝怀有成见。

synos.tran: 怀偏见的；有成见的；偏颇的
损害（prejudice的过去分词）；使抱偏见

remMethod.val: pre(预先) + jud(判断) + ice → 先入为主的判断 → 偏见

words.tran: 不利的；有害的；引起偏见的

trans.tranCn: 怀偏见的；有成见的；偏颇的
trans.tranOther: having an unreasonable dislike of someone or something, especially a dislike of a group of people who belong to a different race, sex, or religion – used to show disapproval

trans.tranCn: 损害（prejudice的过去分词）；使抱偏见
